sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from './Header'; import { ArrowUpIcon, ArrowDownIcon, CurrencyDollarIcon, PlayIcon, ShoppingBagIcon, ChartBarIcon, DocumentIcon, CloudArrowUpIcon, VideoCameraIcon, DocumentTextIcon, TableCellsIcon, CodeBracketIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const stats = [ { name: 'Total Streams', value: '64,456', change: '+20.1%', changeType: 'increase', icon: PlayIcon, link: '/stream-analytics' }, { name: 'Monthly Streams', value: '12,456', change: '+25.8%', changeType: 'increase', icon: PlayIcon, }, { name: 'Sales', value: '1,429', change: '-3.2%', changeType: 'decrease', icon: ShoppingBagIcon, }, { name: 'Conversion Rate', value: '4.5%', change: '+4.1%', changeType: 'increase', icon: ChartBarIcon, }, ]; const quickActions = [ { name: 'Upload', icon: CloudArrowUpIcon, bgColor: 'bg-primary-100', textColor: 'text-primary-600', description: 'Upload any type of file', link: '/upload' }, { name: 'Upload Video', icon: VideoCameraIcon, bgColor: 'bg-orange-100', textColor: 'text-orange-600', description: 'Upload video content', link: '/upload' } ]; const recentFiles = [ { id: 1, name: 'quarterly_report_q3.xlsx', size: '1.2 MB', type: 'Spreadsheet', icon: TableCellsIcon, iconColor: 'text-green-600', iconBg: 'bg-green-100', modifiedAt: '2 hours ago', author: 'Sarah Chen' }, { id: 2, name: 'api_documentation.md', size: '256 KB', type: 'Documentation', icon: CodeBracketIcon, iconColor: 'text-blue-600', iconBg: 'bg-blue-100', modifiedAt: '4 hours ago', author: 'Mike Johnson' }, { id: 3, name: 'contract_template.docx', size: '845 KB', type: 'Document', icon: DocumentTextIcon, iconColor: 'text-indigo-600', iconBg: 'bg-indigo-100', modifiedAt: '6 hours ago', author: 'Lisa Wong' }, { id: 4, name: 'project_proposal.pdf', size: '2.8 MB', type: 'PDF', icon: DocumentIcon, iconColor: 'text-red-600', iconBg: 'bg-red-100', modifiedAt: 'Yesterday', author: 'John Smith' } ]; const Dashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleQuickAction = (action) => { if (action.link) { navigate(action.link); } }; return (
{stats.map((item) => (
item.link && navigate(item.link)} >
{item.changeType === 'increase' ? ( ) : ( )} {item.change}

{item.name}

{item.value}

))}

Quick Actions

{quickActions.map((action) => ( ))}

Recent Files

{recentFiles.map((file) => (

{file.name}

{file.size}

Modified {file.modifiedAt} by {file.author}

))}
); }; export default Dashboard;
